summary: As the U.S. population ages, so does its labor force. But some older people may struggle to find jobs. The Departments of Labor and Education administer workforce development programs to help them. These programs provide career counseling, job search help, skill training, and more—customized to meet older people's specific needs. This Q&A reviews these programs and the unique challenges older people face in the workforce...
title: Older Workers: Department of Labor Should Help State and Local Partners Share Promising Practices
